page.title: 04THE DAILY DIARY OF MY DAD
page.content: At 6.55am my dad wakes up to our Teasmade and musical alarm. Then he pours out the tea for my mum and himself. At 7.55am he rises to have a shower and gets dressed into a suit. Then he starts to prepare the family breakfasts. My dad's consists of fruit juice, cereal and toast then he cleans his teeth. At 8.10 he leaves home to travel to Exeter in a car. He is a regional surveyor and sometimes travels throughout the Westcountry to numerous branches. He works till lunchtime but at 10.15 tea or coffee is brought round by his receptionist. He has a brief lunch break which consists of chips or salad and works to 6 O'clock. He arrives back home and has a large evening meal made by my mum. Then he watches television or works in the garden. At 11.30pm he goes to bed.
